description: Describes your VPC endpoints. The default is to describe all your VPC endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify specific VPC endpoint IDs or filter the results to include only the VPC endpoints that match specific criteria.

parameters.name: VpcEndpointIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the VPC endpoints. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters. ip-address-type - The IP address type ( ipv4 | ipv6). service-name - The name of the service. service-region - The Region of the service. tag:<key> - The key/value combination of a tag assigned to the resource. Use the tag key in the filter name and the tag value as the filter value. For example, to find all resources that have a tag with the key Owner and the value TeamA, specify tag:Owner for the filter name and TeamA for the filter value. tag-key - The key of a tag assigned to the resource. Use this filter to find all resources assigned a tag with a specific key, regardless of the tag value. vpc-id - The ID of the VPC in which the endpoint resides. vpc-endpoint-id - The ID of the endpoint. vpc-endpoint-state - The state of the endpoint ( pendingAcceptance | pending | available | deleting | deleted | rejected | failed). vpc-endpoint-type - The type of VPC endpoint ( Interface | Gateway | GatewayLoadBalancer | Resource | ServiceNetwork). (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return for this request. The request returns a token that you can specify in a subsequent call to get the next set of results. Constraint: If the value is greater than 1,000, we return only 1,000 items.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpoints
nested_items.description: Information about the VPC endpoints.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: The ID of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointType
nested_items.description: The type of endpoint.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC to which the endpoint is associated.

nested_items.name: ServiceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service to which the endpoint is associated.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: PolicyDocument
nested_items.description: The policy document associated with the endpoint, if applicable.

nested_items.name: RouteTableIds
nested_items.description: (Gateway endpoint) The IDs of the route tables associated with the endpoint.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: (Interface endpoint) The subnets for the endpoint.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Groups
nested_items.description: (Interface endpoint) Information about the security groups that are associated with the network interface.

nested_items.name: GroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the security group.

nested_items.name: GroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the security group.

nested_items.name: IpAddressType
nested_items.description: The IP address type for the endpoint.

nested_items.name: DnsOptions
nested_items.description: The DNS options for the endpoint.

nested_items.name: DnsRecordIpType
nested_items.description: The DNS records created for the endpoint.

nested_items.name: PrivateDnsOnlyForInboundResolverEndpoint
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to enable private DNS only for inbound endpoints.

nested_items.name: PrivateDnsEnabled
nested_items.description: (Interface endpoint) Indicates whether the VPC is associated with a private hosted zone.

nested_items.name: RequesterManaged
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the endpoint is being managed by its service.

nested_items.name: NetworkInterfaceIds
nested_items.description: (Interface endpoint) The network interfaces for the endpoint.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DnsEntries
nested_items.description: (Interface endpoint) The DNS entries for the endpoint.

nested_items.name: DnsName
nested_items.description: The DNS name.

nested_items.name: HostedZoneId
nested_items.description: The ID of the private hosted zone.

nested_items.name: CreationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time that the endpoint was created.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags assigned to the endpoint.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the endpoint.

nested_items.name: LastError
nested_items.description: The last error that occurred for endpoint.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The error message for the VPC endpoint error.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code for the VPC endpoint error.

nested_items.name: Ipv4Prefixes
nested_items.description: Array of IPv4 prefixes.

nested_items.name: SubnetId
nested_items.description: ID of the subnet.

nested_items.name: IpPrefixes
nested_items.description: Array of SubnetIpPrefixes objects.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Ipv6Prefixes
nested_items.description: Array of IPv6 prefixes.

nested_items.name: SubnetId
nested_items.description: ID of the subnet.

nested_items.name: IpPrefixes
nested_items.description: Array of SubnetIpPrefixes objects.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: Reason for the failure.

nested_items.name: ServiceNetworkArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service network.

nested_items.name: ResourceConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: ServiceRegion
nested_items.description: The Region where the service is hosted.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use when requesting the next set of items. If there are no additional items to return, the string is empty.
